short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Increase productivity and streamline customer interactions with the best WhatsApp CRM for sales, business and customer support teams

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
WA-CRM is a CRM to organize your WhatsApp web. Create labels to organize chats, quick replies, schedule messages, add chat notes and reminders, and start a chat without saving a number as a contact.

Key Features-
📥 Stay on top of your Inbox
📑 System Tabs: Ready-made tabs that automatically update based on message status, such as:
🟡 Unread: Messages that haven't been opened.
📬 Needs Reply: Messages waiting for your response.
👥 Groups: Chats with more than two participants.
⏳ Awaiting Reply: Messages where you're waiting for a reply.
🛠️ Custom Tabs: Create personalized tabs to organize your chats your way.
🔗 Share Live Chat: Share live WhatsApp conversations via a link; new messages appear almost instantly.
📝 WhatsApp Notes: Add notes to specific chats to keep important details handy.
⏰ WhatsApp Reminders: Set reminders for specific chats to ensure you never miss a follow-up.
📅 Schedule Events: Sync with Google Calendar to schedule events directly from WhatsApp. (Coming Soon)
📢 Connect with Unlimited Customers and Clients
📱 Start Chats with Unsaved Numbers: Send WhatsApp messages to unsaved numbers straight from your desktop.
📇 Contact Management: Easily export and import contacts from WhatsApp in a few clicks. (Coming Soon)
📣 Broadcasting: Send messages to multiple chats at once without needing pre-approved templates or extra charges. (Coming Soon)
🖋️ Message Templates: Send pre-written templates with just one click—no pre-approval required! (Coming Soon)
✨ CRM Syncing (Coming Soon!)
📲 WhatsApp CRM Syncing: Automatically sync your WhatsApp conversations with popular CRMs like HubSpot.
👤 CRM Contact Cards: View and update CRM contact details right from your WhatsApp chats.
WA-CRM is best suited for teams that use WhatsApp Web for work. Whether you’re in Sales, Consulting, Online Selling, Retail, D2C Brands, Real Estate, Insurance, Automotive, Restaurants, Pharmacies, Travel Agencies, Education Services, Financial Services, Delivery Businesses, Marketing, Design, Career Guidance, Jewelry Design, or any other industry, WA-CRM provides a seamless experience to enhance your customer interactions and drive growth. Optimize your team's workflow with powerful tools tailored to fit your business needs.

PRIVACY & SECURITY while using WA-CRM
————————————————————————————————————————
Your Privacy is Our Priority
We DO NOT collect your chat data. Your conversations stay on your computer and never leave your device. We also DO NOT collect any personally identifiable information (PII). You will only hear from us if you give us explicit consent to contact you.
This extension is designed with 100% privacy protection in mind. We NEVER collect or sell your data to third parties under any circumstances. WA CRM Inc., based in the U.S., fully complies with all U.S. privacy laws.
We understand the permissions requested when installing WA CRM on Google Chrome might seem concerning, but they are required solely for the extension’s functionality:
Read and change your data on wa-crm.com and web.whatsapp.com: This permission is necessary to add tabs to the top of WhatsApp Web. We do not collect any chat or contact data from WhatsApp.
Read your browsing history: This permission is needed for the "One-Click to WhatsApp Web (WAW)" feature. It does NOT give us access to your browsing history. As per Chrome Developer Guidelines, this "tab" permission only allows us to see which tabs are currently open, nothing more.
